public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CaptionTemplateDomain>> getCaptionTemplateList(java.lang.String brdc_pgm_id,

         1. Description
        템플릿조회
 2. Example
        Parameters:
        brdc_pgm_id - 방송프로그램아이디
        cap_class_cd - 자막유형코드

        search_word - 검색어
